transcript.line: This is a great movie. You're not gonna regret it. I'm Tim Heidecker. Great guests, great conversations, and a few arguments. It's On Cinema At the Cinema

Hi everybody, my name is Tim Heidecker. Welcome to another episode of On Cinema at the Cinema. It's a web series where we talk about what movies are coming out this weekend, give you guys some advice as to what uh, we love, and uh, what we don't like, so um, I gotta big special guest for you guys today. Um, he's done the show before and he's a film buff and his name is Gregg Turkington. Thanks for coming on the show today.
Hey guys! Always a pleasure to take my seat at the On Cinema screen room, and thanks to all of you who are sending in cards and letters asking to have me on more often.
Hm. Well uh, we've got two movies, and you might say ladies get in free, half price, or uh, uh, what's the expression, ladies night-
It's ladies night.

Ladies night. Uh, 'cause we got Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2. Uh, which stars, uh, Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, directed by Bill Condom, and it's just, uh, another one of these vampire movies, I guess. And it's romantic, and it's uh, full of uh, these sort of situations, uh, which is it turns out to be that's very interesting, uh, very... scary at times, but also a lot of romance and uh, really well-made, so I recommend it-
Good soundtrack.
Good soundtrack.
Lotta good songs and cinematography if you're a film buff, you notice things like that. It's very misty and murky.

Um-
